name: Press this Button to Die
description:
This game is a short visual novel made for a game jam between 2 teams.
Our team was Art Grind & Code Cave.

Some Content Warnings:  
Minor Themes of Anxiety and Suicide
Moderate Trypophobia

Programming: Creasu - Github
Art,  Audio & Dialogue YouLostYourKarkeys - Instagram - Website
Art: Moon_Roon_ - Instagram - Twitter
